Modules¶

restServer¶

class restServer.restHttpServer(cliArgsDict)¶
asyncio rest server for incoming logging messages from the RtBrick System append
stores the json text in redis.
Parameters:
  • cliArgsDict["configFile"] (str) – defines the configfile which is used to load the configDict via function loadBdsSnmpAdapterConfigFile
  • configDict["listeningIP"] (str) – defines the IPv4 address on which the server listens. use 0.0.0.0 for all interfaces.
  • configDict["listeningPort"] (int) – defines the TCP Port address on which the server listens.
  • configDict["redisServerIp"] (str) – defines the IPv4 address on which the redis server listens.
  • configDict["redisServerPort"] (int) – defines the TCP Port address on which the redis server listens.
methods  
handler(request)¶
Coroutine that accepts a Request instance as its only argument.
Stores the json body as string in redis key rtbrickLogging-<client-ip>-<request#>. ###FIXME overrun int
Returnes 200 with a copy of the incoming header dict.
run_forever()¶
starts the aiohttp Web Server
runs then in an infinite loop which stores every second a status K/V dataset in redis
